testsuite.name: When $x:result consists of two or more elements

testcase.name: - The actual result (reported as [Result]) should be saved successfully in a separate file which is well-formed - The expected result (reported as [Expected Result]) should not be saved in a separate file. - [Expected Result] should highlight only <entry0> against <entry2> in the separate file.
the same should be true when the actual result is evaluated with @test
